column4: i have 1 rss reader(liferea) but for some reason for some feeds it shows full text for others 1 or 2 lines only. Is there something wrong on my end or thats some server configuration?
yes, in other rss reader only 1 line to for some feeds(installed rssowl to check)
most likely server side then ;) Try another feed to make sure but it looks like you found the problem....
